projects.title: React App
projects.description: Working in a scrum team using React.js we built a Job Search Board using a RESTful API. It allowed users to search for job postings using a search bar which enables you to filter your search by type of job and/or skill. I worked on the Search Bar component using HTML, CSS (Tailwind) and used context to manage state.
